review:
Dr Payal is extremely good gynaecologist. I was suffering from Pcos/Pcod since 2013 . I visited so many doctors and took lots of treatment and mediciens. Though i was suffering from pcos so after marriage it was a big matter  of conceiving. I visited 6-7 gynaecologist but believe me nobody was Dr Payal like. You can trust her you can talk her openly. I got treated by her . It took 3 months and  finally I concieved , and I delivered healthy  twins last year . It was all just by god grace and graceful medium was dr payal . Parents blessings and some good karmas. 
So you can visit her . She is very friendly very nice , beautiful and loving too. I just love her  the way she is‚Ä¶.Thank you üòä‚ô•Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I delivered my baby in December '23 and since then there hasn't been a day without excitement. Giving birth to my baby is the most beautiful experience I've ever had and I'm on cloud 9 since then. Despite 10 hours of pain it has been my best memory and it has been possible only because of my doctor Payal Chaudhary. 
Words can't express the love and appreciation I have in my heart for you Ma'am üôè
Thanks for nurturing the baby and me through this pregnancy. 
Dealing with endometriosis, Payal ma'am immense support, counseling and positivity has given me the strength and hope to conceive without any difficulty. And during pregnancy ma'am support and positive attitude has got me through Hyperemesis gravidarum. 9 months of vomiting and not have proper intake of food is no joke, but with your support I've gotten through this too. 
Thank you sooo much ma'am with all my heart ‚ù§ You have been no less than God for me üôè

my experience with dr payal was very good, We have always been very satisfied by our consultation with her. No matter whatever be the number of patients, she is very thorough in her consultation. She makes sure she has uncovered any symptom that patient might have missed. After every session with her, we have cleared all our doubts and felt more n more confident.

I am pleased with her knowledge and her professional attitude towards her profession. 

One of the best gynaecologist in Delhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am currently consulting her during my pregnancy and i must say that she is really sweet and gives full attention to her patients. She listens to all there doubts and is good to talk to.
She was recommended to me by a friend of mine and I am really happy to have her  as my gynaecologist.

A wonderful and very patient doctor. She listens very carefully, taking down notes and giving advice. She treated me in a very personal way, even replied to my messages within 5 minutes. I recommend her to everyone who is looking for a wonderful gynaecologist.

Dr. Payal is the most talented and hardworking doctor I have ever seen. We consulted her for numerous times during the pregnancy phase and found that all her suggestions were highly ethical. 

She suggests the best possible treatment plans. We were pleased with her efforts during the phase of delivery.

My search for a doctor ends with dr payal and I would highly recommend her.

Thanks dr Payal for your efforts. You added a value to the medical profession and a big difference to our lifes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Payal is one of the most amaizing, professional doctors I have met, always smiles in good mood and polite, get stuff organized and done. I have been a patient for over five years i think. I always get all  explanations needed without any problems . I have had a procedure with this dr and im glad I did  trusted her. 
Dr. Payal is more than 5 stars. She is a Wonderful woman , i really recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Terrible experience.  The doctor has no patience, I had to remind her of my problems, she did not have my casefile with her. She shouted at me for asking questions (I barely asked her a couple of questions from my lab report) and told me she was losing patience with me.  It was a harrowing experience and I wouldn't recommend her to anyone.
reply_text:
Dear patient 
It is rather sad that in the era of social media it is so easy to do mud slinging. Despite the risk of COVID to us doctors (remember, we are humans as well) I am seeing patients in emergency everyday and doing tele consults as well so that patients can get the treatment they need. I didn‚Äôt refuse you treatment. You got treatment from me a month ago over tele consult as well and that did work for you. The only thing I said was that to understand your problem you will have to make a visit and you will not be charged anything for that visit. By the way, to make that diagnosis USG is not sufficient and one has to do examination as well. But you refused to understand that at all. 
Best of luck to you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She took all the details to analyse the symptoms and cause of the problem and also gave amazing suggestions which probably a young woman should be helped by her family. She clarified all the queries in detail so that I being a patient should have a better understanding of the problem.
